[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Osgiliath Fords.jpg|thumb|300px|Osgiliath Fords in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']]
The '''Osgiliath Fords'''<ref>''[[The Chronology of The Lord of the Rings]]'', p. 120</ref> was an area in the city of [[Osgiliath]] where some bridges were built. One of them housed the [[Dome of Stars]].<ref name="rings">{{S|Rings}}</ref> The river they crossed over was the [[Anduin]] a large and mighty river.

Eventually, these fords and bridges were abandoned along with the rest of the city when [[Sauron]] launched a full scale attack.

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2015: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:A series of fords both north and south of the ruined Great Bridge provide a way across the [[Anduin]].
